content: ललितपुर में जे गौना कुसमाड़ व नेकोरा मार्ग पर देर रात बाइक अनियंत्रित होकर सड़क किनारे तारबाड़ी के लिए लगाई गई मुण्डी से जा टकराई। जिसके चलते बाइक चालक घायल हो गया। उसे गंभीर हालत में उपचार के लिए झांसी मेडिकल कॉलेज ले जाते समय रास्ते में उसकी मौत हो नेकोरा निवासी 50 वर्षीय रामेश्वर पुत्र भुजबल बुधवार को अपने को अपने बहन बहनोई के यहां गया हुआ था।उसके बाद वह किसी काम से कस्बा मड़ावरा चला गया, जहां से वह वापस आ रहा था, जब वह गौना कुसमाड़ व नेकोरा मार्ग पर पहुंचा था कि तभी उसकी बाइक तारबाडी के लिए लगाई गई मुण्डी से जा टकराई। जिससे वह गंभीर रूप से घायल हो गया, राहगीरों ने इसकी सूचना परिजनों को दी तो वह मौके पर पहुंचे और युवक को सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य केन्द्र महरौनी ले गए। जहां से उपचार के लिए जिला...

title: El dólar sube a contramano del euro ante señales divergentes sobre la baja de tasas
content: El dólar global subía levemente en la primera mitad de la jornada del jueves gracias a los datos sobre el mercado laboral y el sector manufacturero en Estados Unidos, a contramano del euro, que bajaba luego de que el Banco Central Europeo (BCE) mantuviera sin cambios las tasas de interés. En Uruguay , la divisa recuperó la senda positiva. Con reacciones tardías a las novedades de las primeras horas de la jornada, el índice dólar —que mide el desempeño del billete verde en relación a una canasta de seis divisas de relevancia internacional— ganaba un 0,27%, para situarse así n 103,95 unidades luego de que el miércoles tocara un mínimo de cuatro meses de 103,64 unidades. Asimismo,...

title: Mikautadze pojačao Lion
content: Žorž Mikautadze potpisao je za Lion. Napadač selekcije Gruzije bio je u grupi od šest igrača sa po tri gola na Euro 2024, koji su podijelili Zlatnu kopačku. Lion je objavio transfer gruzijskog napadača iz Meca, a ugovor važi do 2028. godine. Transfer je iznosio 18,5 miliona eura, još 4,5 miliona moglo bi biti plaćeno u vidu bonusa. Osim toga, Lion će biti dužan milion eura Mecu u narednom transferu, ali i još 15 odsto u slučaju da ga Lion proslijedi za iznos veći od plaćenog obeštećenja.

title: Rigorozni uslovi za Ruse na OI! Samo 15 takmičara ide u Pariz i to pod neutralnom zastavom!
content: Mnoge je iznenadila ova cifra s obzirom da su na prethodnim Olimpijskim igrama u Tokiju, Rusi imali čak 335 predstavnika, koji su osvojili 20 zlatnih medalja, 28 srebrnih i 23 bronzane. Navijači mogu da odahnu, Stefan Jović nije završio karijeru u košarkaškoj reprezentaciji Srbije. 18.07.2024 12:00 Nikola Jokić, centar reprezentacije Srbije, oduševio je Amerikance tokom meča sa njihovom košarkaškom reprezentacijom u Abu Dabiju. 18.07.2024 08:24 Sada ih na planetarnu smotru u Pariz putuje samo 15, a takmičiće se u pet sportova (biciklizam, tenis, plivanje, trambolina, kajak i kanu). Situacija je takva zbog opštih zabrana, jer Rusima nije dozvoljeno učešće u ekipnim...

title: Co za wpadka w trakcie meczu Wisły! Polsat natychmiast to wyjaśnił
creator: Agnieszka Piskorz
content: Poprzedni sezon był słodko-gorzki dla Wisły Kraków. Choć nie wywalczyła awansu do ekstraklasy, to zapewniła sobie miejsce w eliminacjach do Ligi Europy. To za sprawą triumfu w Pucharze Polski. Rywalizację w rozgrywkach Starego Kontynentu rozpoczęła od pierwszej rundy i z racji rozstawienia trafiła na teoretycznie łatwego rywala - KF Llapi. W pierwszym meczu ekipa Kazimierza Moskala wygrała 2:0 u siebie po golach Igora Sapały i Angela Rodado. W czwartek o godzinie 16:30 zagrała w rewanżu, tym razem na terytorium rywala. I nie dość, że grała tam niemal bez publiczności, to fani znad Wisły przez chwilę nie mogli nawet śledzić zmagań. Polscy kibice byli w szoku. Nagle zniknął...

title: FOTO Arheolozi iskopali drevnu palaču u središtu Rima
content: ARHEOLOZI su u središtu Rima, ispred bazilike sv. Ivana Lateranskoga, iskopali ostatke srednjovjekovne palače u kojoj su najvjerojatnije prebivali pape prije nego što su se premjestili u Vatikan. Naime, stručnjaci smatraju da je pronađena složena arhitektonska struktura pripadala monumentalnoj bazilici izgrađenoj u 4. stoljeću prema narudžbi rimskog cara Konstantina. "Ovo je izuzetno važno otkriće za grad Rim i njegovu srednjovjekovnu povijest, budući da na trgu u moderno doba nikada nisu provedena opsežna arheološka iskapanja", talijansko ministarstvo kulture. Objekt se prvotno sastojao od monumentalne bazilike, ali su ga tijekom srednjeg vijeka nekoliko puta proširivali i...

title: Mediat: Biden voi luovuttaa jo lähipäivinä – Obama kääntänyt selkänsä
content: Maa näyttää sortuvan presidentti Joe Bidenin vaalikampanjan alta, ainakin yhdysvaltalaismedian viimeisimpien raporttien perusteella. Tuoreimpana käänteenä entinen demokraattipresidentti Barack Obama vaikuttaa kääntäneen Bidenille selkänsä, raportoi The Washington Post . Obama on kertonut läheisille liittolaisilleen, että hänen mielestään Bidenin voittomahdollisuudet ovat laskeneet merkittävästi, WP kuvailee. Obaman kerrotaan ajattelevan, että Bidenin on syytä ”vakavasti harkita” hänen ehdokkuutensa uskottavuutta. WP:n mukaan presidentit ovat keskustelleet ainoastaan kerran 27. kesäkuuta järjestetyn vaaliväittelyn jälkeen. Axios-media taas arvioi, että demokraattien...

title: Пожежа на російському заводі "Уралтрансмаш": експер вказав на важливий нюанс
content: Офіційна версія російської влади про причини пожежі на військовому заводі "Уралтрансмаш" в Єкатеринбурзі значно відрізняються від свідчень очевидців, які шириться мережею, заявив військовий експерт, директор з розвитку інформаційно-консалтингової компанії Defense Express Валерій Рябих в ефірі "Еспресо" . "Що стосується пожежі на військовому заводі "Уралтрансмаш", то у РФ палає, говорячи сленгом, "жирна" ціль. Цікаво те, що завдяки росіянам ми можемо у прямому етері стежити за цією пожежею. Говорять, що пожежа розгорілася в одному з цехів цього заводу та зайняла площу 420 кв.м. Можна відзначити, що є певні розбіжності й у тому, що подає офіційна влада, бо є дві версії, одна...

title: Украина U-18 проведет сбор и два матча. Названа заявка игроков
content: Сборная Украины по хоккею U-18 проведет два контрольных матча против сборной Словакии U-18. Игры пройдут 25 и 26 июля, а до этого состоится тренировочный сбор в Богуславе. На него наставник Александр Бобкин назвал расширенную заявку из 29 игроков. Тренер постепенно формирует команду на новый чемпионат мира в Дивизионе 1A. На минувшем турнире украинская команда финишировала второй, имея шансы подняться в элиту.

title: ਨਸ਼ਾ ਤਸਕਰਾਂ ਦੀ ਆਲੀਸ਼ਾਨ ਜ਼ਿੰਦਗੀ ’ਤੇ ਗ੍ਰਹਿਣ... ਵੇਖੋ, ਕਿਵੇਂ ਪੁਲਿਸ ਨੇ ਕੀਤੀ ਕਰੋੜਾਂ ਦੀ ਜਾਇਦਾਦ ਜ਼ਬਤ
content: ਜਲੰਧਰ ਕਮਿਸ਼ਨਰੇਟ ਪੁਲਿਸ ਨੇ ਡਰੱਗ ਮਨੀ ਤੋਂ ਖਰੀਦੀ ਗਈ ਕਰੀਬ 1.34 ਕਰੋੜ ਰੁਪਏ ਦੀਆਂ ਜਾਇਦਾਦਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਜ਼ਬਤ ਕੀਤਾ ਗਿਆ ਹੈ । ਇਸ ਸਬੰਧੀ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ ਦਿੰਦਿਆਂ ਏਸੀਪੀ ਦਮਨਬੀਰ ਸਿੰਘ ਦੇ ਦੱਸਿਆ ਕਿ ਕਮਿਸ਼ਨਰੇਟ ਪੁਲਿਸ ਨੇ ਨਸ਼ਾ ਤਸਕਰਾਂ ਦੀ ਸਪਲਾਈ ਚੇਨ ਨੂੰ ਤੋੜਨ ਲਈ ਮਹੱਤਵਪੂਰਨ ਪ੍ਰਗਤੀ ਕੀਤੀ ਹੈ। ਇਹ ਵੀ ਪੜ੍ਹੋ: ਅਕਾਲੀ ਦਲ ਨੇ ਸਿਰਫ਼ ਬਠਿੰਡਾ ’ਚ ਲੜੀ ਚੋਣ...ਚੰਦੂਮਾਜਰਾ ਨੇ ਸੁਖਬੀਰ ਬਾਦਲ ’ਤੇ ਲਾਏ ਹੋਰ ਵੀ ਗੰਭੀਰ ਇਲਜ਼ਾਮ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੱਸਿਆ ਕਿ 17 ਮੁਲਜ਼ਮਾਂ ਖ਼ਿਲਾਫ਼ ਥਾਣਾ ਡਿਵੀਜ਼ਨ 1 ਜਲੰਧਰ ਵਿੱਚ ਐਫਆਈਆਰ 57 ਮਿਤੀ 27-04-2024 ਅਧੀਨ 21ਸੀ-29-61-85 ਐਨਡੀਪੀਐਸ ਐਕਟ ਦਰਜ ਕੀਤੀ ਗਈ ਸੀ। ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੱਸਿਆ ਕਿ ਪੁਲੀਸ ਨੇ ਇਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਕੋਲੋਂ 48.5 ਕਿਲੋ ਹੈਰੋਇਨ ਬਰਾਮਦ ਕੀਤੀ ਹੈ ਅਤੇ ਹੁਣ ਪੁਲੀਸ ਨੇ ਇਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀ ਜਾਇਦਾਦ ਨੂੰ ਜ਼ਬਤ ਕਰਨ ਲਈ ਕਾਰਵਾਈ ਸ਼ੁਰੂ ਕਰ ਦਿੱਤੀ ਹੈ। ਏਸੀਪੀ ਨੇ ਦੱਸਿਆ ਕਿ ਇਸ ਕਦਮ ਦਾ ਉਦੇਸ਼ ਨਸ਼ਾ ਤਸਕਰਾਂ ਵਿਰੁੱਧ ਮਿਸਾਲੀ ਕਾਰਵਾਈ ਨੂੰ...

title: अज्ञात बदमाश ने प्राचीन मंदिर को बनाया निशाना:सीसीटीवी में कैद हुई वारदात, पुजारी ने कोतवाली पुलिस से शिकायत की
content: शाजापुर जिले के ग्राम भरड़ स्थित प्राचीन खेड़ापति हनुमान मंदिर में बदमाशों ने चोरी की वारदात को अंजाम दिया, जहां से बदमाश मोटर चुरा ले गया। पुलिस द्वारा बदमाश की तलाश की जा रही है। जानकारी के अनुसार प्राचीन खेड़ापति हनुमान मंदिर भरड़ में लगभग तीन बार चोरियां हो चुकी हैं। मंदिर पुजारी घनश्याम बैरागी ने बताया कि मंदिर पर पूर्व में भी कई बार चोरियां हो चुकी हैं। पानी की मोटर घंटाल, दान पेटी, पक्षियों के लिए भक्तों द्वारा दिए गए चावल जो 70 किलो थे वह भी बदमाश चुरा ले गए थे। जिसकी शिकायत कोतवाली थाने पर की गई थी, मगर अभी तक पुलिस ने को कोई कार्रवाई नहीं की है। वहीं बुधवार रात भी दो अज्ञात चोरों द्वारा मंदिर की मोटर चुरा ली गई, जिसकी शिकायत के लिए मंदिर पुजारी कोतवाली थाना में पहुंचे। थाना...

title: Meet the Fair Isle Clipper knitter aboard a 70ft boat in Oban Bay
creator: Louise Glen
content: As life on the ocean waves go, Shetlander Vicki Leslie has done something a little more unusual than most – she has knitted 11 ‘clipper hats’. Vicki is one of fewer than 100 people who have traversed the planet on the Clipper Round the World 2023/24 race. To keep her “busy” she took Jamiesons of Shetland two-ply wool to knit hats, she is now auctioning for UNICEF. The Clippers and will be here until Sunday morning when they head off on the last lap to Portsmouth. Vicki even got her mum Lisbeth to bring extra supplies of two-ply wool out to Seattle so she could complete her challenge. Vicki, a boat chef in “real” life, knows the seas, but describes the Clipper Round the World race as a “trip...

title: Hardik Natasa Divorce: ৪ বছরের একসঙ্গে পথ চলা শেষ হার্দিক-নাতাশার, সন্তান কার দায়িত্বে থাকবে?
creator: ABP Ananda
content: জল্পনা চলছিল বেশ কয়েক মাস ধরে। দুজনকে একত্রে কোথাও দেখা যাচ্ছিল না। হার্দিক পাণ্ড্যর খেলা দেখতে মাঠে আসছিলেন না স্ত্রী নাতাশা স্ত্যাঙ্কোভিচ। এমনকী, হার্দিক মুম্বই ইন্ডিয়ান্সের অধিনায়ক হলেও মাঠে থাকছিলেন না নাতাশা। ভারত টি-২০ বিশ্বকাপে চ্যাম্পিয়ন হওয়ার পর নিদেনপক্ষে সোশ্যাল মিডিয়াতেও কোনও অভিনন্দনবার্তা দেননি নাতাশা। সব জল্পনায় সিলমোহর পড়ল বৃহস্পতিবার। সোশ্যাল মিডিয়ায় যৌথ বিবৃতি দিয়ে হার্দিক ও নাতাশা জানিয়ে দিলেন, তাঁদের বিচ্ছেদ হয়েছে। সার্বিয়ার অভিনেত্রী ও মডেল নাতাশার সঙ্গে হার্দিকের প্রেম ও বিয়ে ছিল রূপকথার মতো। ২০২০ সালে দুজনের বাগদান হয়। সে বছর ৩০ জুলাই হার্দিক-নাতাশার পুত্রসন্তান অগ্যস্ত জন্ম নেয়। পরে ২০২৩ সালের ১৪ ফেব্রুয়ারি ঘটা করে বিয়ের অনুষ্ঠান সারেন...

title: Kalki 2898 AD: ‘క‌ల్కి 2898 AD’ మూవీకి మాజీ ఉపరాష్ట్రపతి ప్రశంసలు - అంతర్జాతీయ స్థాయి సినిమా అంటూ పోస్ట్
creator: Rajasekhar Gundabatthuni
content: Kalki 2898 AD: రెబ‌ల్ స్టార్ ప్ర‌భాస్ న‌టించిన లేటెస్ట్ మూవీ ‘క‌ల్కి 2898 AD’. ద‌ర్శ‌కుడు నాగ్ అశ్విన్ తెర‌కెక్కించిన ఈ సైన్స్ ఫిక్షన్ సినిమా, బాక్సాఫీస్ వద్ద ఎపిక్ బ్లాక్ బస్టర్ గా నిలిచింది. ప్రపంచ వ్యాప్తంగా వెయ్యి కోట్లకు పైగా వసూళ్లు రాబట్టి సరికొత్త రికార్డులు సృష్టించింది. మూడో వారంలోనూ ఈ చిత్రానికి ప్రేక్షకులు బ్ర‌హ్మ‌ర‌థం పడుతున్నారు. ఇండియన్ మైథాలజీకి ఫ్యూచర్ వరల్డ్ ను ముడిపెడుతూ నాగి ఈ సినిమాని రూపొందించారు. ఇప్పటికే పలువురు సినీ రాజకీయ ప్రముఖులు చిత్ర బృందాన్ని అభినందించగా.. తాజాగా మాజీ ఉపరాష్ట్రపతి ఎం. వెంకయ్య నాయుడు ఈ మూవీ చూసి తన అభిప్రాయాన్ని సోషల్ మీడియాలో పంచుకున్నారు. 'కల్కి 2898 ఏడీ' సినిమా మంచి అనుభూతిని కలిగించిందని, ఇదొక ఇంటర్నేషనల్ స్థాయి మూవీ అని వెంకయ్య నాయుడు...

title: Nic Nemeth Isn’t Likely To Go To NXT As Part of TNA Crossover
creator: Joseph Lee
content: In an interview with Comicbook.com (via Fightful ), Nic Nemeth spoke about the possibility of appearing in NXT as part of the ongoing crossover with TNA Wrestling. Nemeth spent 19 years in the company as Dolph Ziggler. He said: “ I feel like that’s more for some up and comers and some people with some unfinished business. I think after 19 years, there’s no unfinished business there at NXT for me. Now, if Randy Orton calls me out on Raw, okay, let’s talk. But at the moment, that NXT back and forth and getting people to jump and not know who’s going to be there, I love that there’s a possibility that I could show up and everyone would go, what the hell? And I also wonder what music do we play...

title: Λαμίν Γιαμάλ: Τετραπλασιάστηκε η αξία του στο ποδοσφαιρικό χρηματιστήριο μετά το Euro - Έφτασε τα 120 εκατ. ευρώ
content: Οι εμφανίσεις του με την εθνική Ισπανίας στο πρόσφατο Ευρωπαϊκό Πρωτάθλημα της Γερμανίας «εκτόξευσαν» την αξία του στο ποδοσφαιρικό χρηματιστήριο. Ο 17χρονος σταρ της Μπαρτσελόνα ήταν πέραν πάσης αμφιβολίας ένας από τους μεγάλους πρωταγωνιστές της κατάκτησης του τροπαίου από την «Ρόχα», καταρρίπτοντας, μάλιστα, και το ρεκόρ του νεότερου παίκτη που σκόραρε στο συγκεκριμένο τουρνουά, σε ηλικία 16 ετών και 363 ημερών. Επίσης αναδείχθηκε ο καλύτερος νέος παίκτης της διοργάνωσης, δίνοντας και την ασίστ στον Νίκο Γουίλιαμς στον τελικό, από την οποία προήλθε το 1-0 επί της Αγγλίας. Επίσης αγωνίστηκε και στα 7 παιχνίδια του EURO 2024,...

title: ویب سیریز سے قبل کسی نے سنجیدہ نہیں لیا، سوناکشی سہنا
content: ممبئی (ڈیلی پاکستان آن لائن) بالی وڈ اداکارہ سوناکشی سنہا نے انکشاف کیا ہے کہ انہیں ویب سیریز ’ہیرامنڈی میں کاسٹ سے قبل کسی نے سنجیدہ نہیں لیا۔ ایک تازہ انٹرویو میں اداکارہ نے اس بات پر خوشی کا اظہار کیا کہ سنجے لیلا بھنسالی نے ’فریدن‘ کے کردار کیلئے انہیں چانس دیا، سوناکشی سنہا کا کہنا تھا کہ وہ منفی اور نفسیاتی قسم کے کرداروں میں دلچسپی رکھتی ہیں اور انہیں ’فریدن‘ کا کردار کرنے میں بہت زیادہ مزہ آیا تھا۔ ان کا کہنا تھا کہ بطور اداکارہ وہ ہر قسم کا کردار کرسکتی ہیں اور چیلنجنگ کردار ملنے کیریئر کیلئے بہت اچھا ہوتا ہے۔

title: Gala Montes revela si existe la posibilidad de reconciliarse con su mamá
creator: Angelica Moreno
content: CIUDAD DE MÉXICO.- Gala Montes , ha hecho frente a recientes acusaciones de su madre, Doña Crista , sobre supuestas tensiones familiares. En una declaración a un medio de comunicación, Montes expresó sentirse liberada tras desahogarse sobre las presiones que enfrentó . En relación a las constantes declaraciones adversas de su madre en redes sociales, se mostró molesta. title: La carta de más de 600 ciudadanos al Presidente Petro: le piden respeto por la Constitución y la institucionalidad
content: La carta titulada: 'Manifiesto por el Estado de Derecho y la Democracia', fue firmada por 600 ciudadanos, entre los cuales resaltan figuras destacadas de la academia y de múltiples sectores políticos. La principal preocupación de los firmantes sería el respeto a las instituciones, por lo que en el documento se le solicita, al presidente Gustavo Petro, cesar el uso de "expresiones agresivas que podrían desencadenar actos de violencia política". title: Përfshihet nga zjarri një automjet në Uglar të Gjilanit
content: Është përfshirë nga zjarri një automjet në fshatin Uglar të Gjilanit. Këtë e ka konfirmuar zëdhënësi i policisë për rajonin e Gjilanit, Valon Osmani, i cili njoftoi se përveç dëmeve materiale në automjet, lëndime trupore nuk ka pësuar askush. “Më 18.07.2024 rreth orës 14:37 kemi pranuar informacion se në fshatin Uglar komuna e Gjilanit një automjete me targa civile është përfshirë nga zjarri”. “Njësitet policore kanë dalë në vendin e ngjarjes së bashku me njësitin e zjarrfikësve të cilët e kanë lokalizuar zjarrin. Përveç dëmeve materiale në automjet, lëndime trupore nuk ka pësuar askush”, thuhet tutje në konfirmim.

title: De letra inocente y suena “casi Génesis”: las claves de la canción inédita de Soda Stereo (y cuándo podría lanzarse)
content: Un artista puede dejar este mundo, pero en la industria musical eso no es problema para continuar expandiendo su obra. Son comunes los lanzamientos póstumos en base a viejas grabaciones inéditas que no llegaron a los surcos del disco; ahí está Now and Then , publicitada como la última canción de The Beatles . Y en Sudamérica, no se quedan atrás; los fans de Soda Stereo bien pueden celebrar con la confirmación del lanzamiento de una canción inédita del grupo que integraron el fallecido Gustavo Cerati , además de Zeta Bosio y Charly Alberti . title: Fuertes lluvias colapsan barda del Museo Nacional del Virreinato en Tepotzotlán, Edomex
creator: Alejandra Bedoya
content: México.- Las fuertes lluvias registradas durante los últimos días en el Estado de México han provocado afectaciones en el Museo Nacional del Virreinato en Tepotzotlán , pues de acuerdo con las imágenes que circulan en redes sociales, una parte de la barda perimetral se debilitó y colapsó. El incidente se registró justo en la columna conocida como “ San Miguelito ”, donde la presión del agua generó un notable boquete en la barda de este espacio del Instituto Nacional de Antropología e Historia (INAH), sobre Av. title: Max Verstappen casts pivotal F1 2024 prediction as Red Bull unleash biggest RB20 upgrade yet
creator: Oliver Harden
content: Max Verstappen has admitted it will be difficult to call how the rest of the F1 2024 season will unfold if the latest Red Bull RB20 upgrade does not deliver as expected at the Hungarian Grand Prix. Having produced the most dominant season in the sport’s history in F1 2023, winning 21 out of a possible 22 races as Verstappen eased to a third World Championship, Red Bull started the F1 2024 campaign in similar fashion, winning four of the first five rounds. However, the RB20 has struggled over recent months, with Verstappen winning three of the last seven races stretching back to the Miami Grand Prix in early May. title: بازگشت آقای گل بعد از ۴ سال؛ علیپور به پرسپولیس پیوست
content: ، در پایان رقابت‌های این فصل لیگ برتر پرتغال، علی علیپور مهاجم ۲۸ ساله و ایرانی باشگاه ژیل ویسنته بعد از دو فصل حضور نه چندان موفق از این تیم پرتغالی جدا شد. از همان روزهای نخست جدایی وی از این تیم، گمانه‌زنی‌ در خصوص بازگشت او به پرسپولیس زده شد و رفته رفته این موضوع شکل واقعیت به خود گرفت. باشگاه پرسپولیس بعد از جدایی این مهاجم با وی مذاکرات کوتاهی داشت اما به دلیل مشمول بودن برای انجام خدمت سربازی، مذاکرات با وی متوقف شد. بعد از حل شدن مشکل سربازی این بازیکن، سرخ‌پوشان مذاکرات خود را به صورت رسمی با مهاجم سابق خود از سر گرفتند. در نهایت بعد از توافق طرفین، سرانجام علی علیپور بعد از ۴ سال به پرسپولیس بازگشت تا در لیگ بیست و چهارم لباس این تیم را بر تن کند.

title: Премьер Израиля Биньямин Нетаньяху побывал в секторе Газа
content: Премьер-министр Израиля Биньямин Нетаньяху посетил город Рафах на юге сектора Газа, сообщил советник офиса премьера Дмитрий Гендельман. Отмечается, что детали его визита будут опубликованы позже. Сегодня премьер также намерен встретиться с министром обороны Израиля Йоавом Галантом и израильской переговорной группой, которая работает над заключением соглашения о прекращении огня с палестинским радикальным движением «Хамас», передает The Times of Israel . Ожидается, что на встрече господин Нетаньяху подтвердит новые требования Израиля касательно сделки о перемирии. Ранее глава политбюро «Хамаса» Исмаил Хания заявил , что Биньямин Нетаньяху выдвинул новые условия для достижения перемирия...

content: فرشید ریاحی اظهار داشت: ۵۴ درصد از خانه های روستایی در شهرستان کوهرنگ با استفاده از تسهیلات بهسازی و بازسازی مسکن روستایی و به همت خود مردم مقاوم سازی شده است. بیشتر بخوانید وی از مردم شهرستان کوهرنگ خواست تا با مراجعه به ادارات بنیاد مسکن و دریافت تسهیلات طرح ویژه بهسازی مسکن نسبت به مقاوم سازی خانه‌ها اقدام کنند.

title: Telangana Cyber Police Warn Farmers Against Fraud Post Loan Waiver Deposits
creator: DC Correspondent
content: Hours after the government deposited money into farmers' accounts as part of the loan waiver initiative, the cyber police on Thursday advised farmers to take measures to prevent cybercriminals from targeting their accounts. Upon obtaining information about possible attempts by cyber fraudsters, the cybercrime police suggested that farmers avoid responding to unknown links on smartphones and refrain from revealing OTPs (one-time passwords) to strangers. Police advised the farmers to always verify the source of unsolicited calls, messages, or emails before sharing personal or financial information. The cybercrime police also issued an advisory recommending that individuals verify the status...

title: Hasta un 13% de los casos de demencia pueden tratarse de una enfermedad tratable y mal diagnosticada
content: A medida que la población mundial envejece, cada vez más personas se enfrentan el temor del deterioro cognitivo, ya sea personalmente o en sus seres queridos. La demencia es una de las principales causas de este deterioro y afecta a millones de personas en todo el mundo. Cada año, se registran 10 millones de nuevos casos de demencia a nivel mundial pero el 13% pueden tener un diagnóstico erróneo, en este caso un problema hepático, y pueden tratarse , según un estudio . La demencia es un término general que describe un conjunto de síntomas que afectan la memoria, el pensamiento y las habilidades sociales lo suficientemente graves como para interferir con la vida diaria. Las formas...

title: Benfica: Pavlidis operado com sucesso ao polegar direito
content: O Benfica informou que Pavlidis foi operado com sucesso à fratura do polegar direito . O avançado grego, reforço dos encarnados para a nova temporada, lesionou-se no encontro particular com o Celta de Vigo, na sequência de uma queda aparatosa na escadaria de acesso aos balneários do Estádio Municipal de Águeda . Logo aos seis minutos de jogo, Pavlidis tentou evitar a saída de bola pela linha lateral, saltou os placards publicitários e acabou por cair para a escadaria. O atacante do Benfica deu uma cambalhota, caiu sentado e deu logo sinal de estar bem, apesar das mazelas na mão direita. Pavlidis ainda bisou diante do conjunto espanhol, antes de ser substituído ao intervalo.

title: Nintendo’s new accessory might confirm a Switch 2 leak
creator: Jacob Siegal
content: Seven years after launching the Switch, Nintendo is finally releasing its own charging stand for the console’s Joy-Con controllers. On Thursday, Nintendo revealed the new Joy-Con Charging Stand (Two-Way) accessory on Twitter, announcing that it will be available starting October 17. The company did not share any details about the price, but we’ll likely find out more about the accessory in the coming weeks ahead of its launch. Based on the pictures Nintendo shared, the stand looks somewhat similar to the Joy-Con Grip. You can slide your Joy-Cons into either side of the stand and plug a USB-C cord into the top to start charging. It’s also possible to charge the with the stand, which happen...

title: AVM'de genç kızın fotoğrafını çeken 75 yaşındaki adama gözaltı
content: 20 yaşındaki genç bir kızın fotoğrafını çeken 75 yaşındaki yaşlı adam, polis tarafından yakalanarak gözaltına alındı. SAVUNMASI PES DEDİRTTİ Olay, Samsun'un Atakum ilçesi Denizevleri Mahallesi Atatürk Bulvarı üzerinde bulunan Yeşilyurt AVM'de meydana geldi. Alınan bilgilere göre, AVM'de bulunan İ.A.(20) adlı genç kızın cep telefonu ile fotoğrafını çeken O.A.(75), şikayet üzerine Atakum İlçe Emniyet Müdürlüğü Suç Önleme ve Soruşturma Büro Amirliği ekipleri tarafından yakalanarak gözaltına alındı. Bugün Samsun Adliyesine sevk edilen O.A. kötü bir niyetinin olmadığını, ortam çok kötü diye eşine göstermek için fotoğraf çektiğini ileri sürdü....

title: Nina Badrić ponovno oduševila stajlingom: Ovaj put nosi haljinu s poznatim potpisom
content: Još prije nekoliko dana naš je kada se u Šibeniku pojavila u kratkoj haljinici londonskog brenda SRVC, a sada je domaća glazbenica odlučila servirati još jedan . Nakon što je nekoliko dana odmarala na elitnoj grčkoj destinaciji, gdje se družila s te napunila baterije prekrasnim zalascima sunca, se vratila poslovnim obavezama te priredila u Crnoj Gori. Za nastup u Kotoru naša je glazbenica odabrala haljinu u kojoj je nemoguće proći nezamijećeno! Riječ je o skupocjenoj haljini australskog brenda čija cijena iznosi čak više od 2.000 eura, no isplatilo se... Efektna haljina od 100%-tne svile ističe se jarkom bojom, ali i zanimljivim lepršavim krojem koji sjajno odgovara...

title: 'SON 인종차별 논란' 포스테코글루 감독 소신발언 '손흥민이 가장 중요, 그의 결정에 따를 것'
creator: 김가을 기자
content: [스포츠조선 김가을 기자]엔제 포스테코글루 토트넘 감독이 '캡틴' 손흥민을 지지했다. 토트넘은 18일(이하 한국시각) 영국 에든버러의 타인캐슬 파크에서 열린 허츠(스코틀랜드)와의 프리 시즌 친선 경기에서 5대1로 승리했다. 손흥민은 선발로 나서 전반 45분을 소화했다. 날카로운 움직임을 보여주며 새 시즌에 대한 기대감을 높였다. 경기 뒤 포스테코글루 감독은 손흥민에 대해 언급했다. 그는 '로드리고 벤탄쿠르의 인종차별 사건은 손흥민의 뜻대로 할 것'이라는 의견을 전했다. 토트넘은 시즌을 앞두고 문제가 있었다. 벤탄쿠르의 발언 때문이었다. 우루과이 출신 벤탄쿠르는 지난 6월 자국 방송 프로그램에 출연해...

title: Орбан назвал три глобальных игрока, способных повлиять на Украину
content: БУДАПЕШТ, 18 июл - РИА Новости. ЕС, США, Китай и Турция способны повлиять на разрешение конфликта на Украине, написал премьер-министр Венгрии Виктор Орбан в отчете главе Евросовета Шарлю Мишелю. Орбан также заявил Мишелю, что стороны конфликта на Украине не начнут искать выход из него без внешнего вмешательства. По словам премьера Венгрии, Китай продолжит участвовать в урегулировании конфликта на Украине, если его шансы на успех "будут близки к определенным", однако, по оценкам Пекина , на данный момент это не так.

title: Evgeny Kuznetsov clears unconditional waivers, has his NHL contract terminated by the Hurricanes
creator: By STEPHEN WHYNO - AP Hockey Writer
content: Evgeny Kuznetsov had his contract terminated Thursday after clearing unconditional waivers, bringing an abrupt end to the talented but inconsistent center's NHL career, at least for the time being. The Carolina Hurricanes put Kuznetsov on unconditional waivers Wednesday for the purpose of terminating his deal. Kuznetsov by agreeing to the mutual termination walks away from the $6 million salary owed to him in the final season of his $64.2 million, seven-year deal originally signed in 2017. title: Vieira quits as Strasbourg coach, linked to USA job
content: Patrick Vieira stood down as manager of Strasbourg, the Ligue 1 club confirmed on Thursday, as his name was linked to the vacant United States men's team coaching job. Vieira, a 1998 World Cup winner with France, joined Strasbourg last season and is leaving "by mutual agreement," the French club said. Vieira, 48, coached New York City in the MLS between 2016-2018 and, according to widespread reports, could be returning to the US to succeed Gregg Berhalter. Berhalter was axed as United States coach following their first-round exit in the Copa America. Vieira was asked about the States job last week after Strasbourg lost 4-0 to Turkish giants Fernebahce in a pre-season friendly. "The United...

content: La fin du Tour semble compromise pour Tobias Johannessen (Uno-X Mobility) après une chute sur la . Il est apparu le maillot déchiré et le bras en écharpe dans la zone d'arrivée. Combatif du jour, c'est un membre de son équipe qui est allé récupérer son prix sur le podium.

title: В парке «Смоленский рубеж» пройдет Афганская реконструкция
content: Военно-исторический клуб «Смоленский рубеж» сообщает о проведении уникального мероприятия. 3 августа, впервые в истории военно-исторической реконструкции на Смоленщине, в парке "Смоленский рубеж" состоится реконструкция боя периода Афганской войны (1979-1989), посвящённая 35-летию вывода советских войск из Афганистана. Гостей мероприятия ожидает максимально приближенная к реальным условиям работа реконструкторов. Будет представлена аутентичная военная техника, участвуют клубы из других регионов, и будет использоваться максимальное количество пиротехники. title: Bereaved families 'extremely concerned' about scope of HSE probe into baby and mother deaths
content: THE HSE IS to conduct a review into baby and maternal deaths during childbirth over a three-year period. The review, described as a “confidential inquiry”, will begin later this year and will cover the years 2021 to 2023, with an updated report published annually. The National Women and Infants Health Programme (NWIHP), which leads the delivery of maternity, gynaecology and neonatal services in Ireland, is currently developing terms of reference for the review. The HSE said there will be public and patient involvement in the review process, which will need to assess case notes. To do this, expert assessors will be drawn from obstetrics, midwifery, neonatology, neonatal nursing, perinatal...

title: Ursula von der Leyen reelected to a second 5-year term as European Commission president
content: Strasbourg, Jul 18 (AP) Lawmakers at the European Parliament on Thursday reelected Ursula von der Leyen to a second 5-year term as president of the European Union's executive commission, giving her a comfortable majority and heading off a possible leadership vacuum. Von der Leyen raised both fists in victory as the Parliament President Roberta Metsola read out the result at the legislature. She called her reelection a victory for her backers, lawmakers she called "pro-European, pro-Ukraine (and) pro-rule of law.” The reelection ensures leadership continuity for the 27-nation bloc as it wrestles with crises ranging from the war in Ukraine to climate change, migration and housing shortages....

title: Cedevita Olimpija predstavila Prepeliča
content: Dvadesettrogodišnji košarkaš je prethodno nastupao za belgijsku Spiru i sa šampionom Slovenije je ugovor potpisao na dve godine. Momak koji je rođak nekadašnjeg košarkaša Reala i Cedevita Olimpije, Klemena, odmah se stavio na raspolaganje treneru Zvezdanu Mitroviću. - Raduje me što sam dobio priliku da pomognem ekipi da ostvari svoje ciljeve. Jedva čekam da upoznam sve u klubu, posebno navijače - rekao je Prepelič na predstavljanju. Bine Prepelič joins us in Cedevita Olimpija! , welcome to the Dragons Family! U pitanju je slovenački reprezentativac visok tačno dva metra koji igra na poziciji krilnog centra. - Igranjem u belgijskom šampionatu već je stekao određeno iskustvo...

title: Bolado interpondrá una querella contra Movelllán por calumnias e injurias
مرحبا 2024.. تسجيل عبور نحو 538 ألف مسافر عبر موانئ المملكة
creator: ل.أبروك
content: هبة بريس أفاد وزير النقل واللوجستيك محمد عبد الجليل، أمس الأربعاء بمجلس المستشارين، بأنه تم تسجيل عبور حوالي 538 ألف مسافر عبر الموانئ المغربية إلى غاية 15 يوليوز الجاري ضمن عملية “مرحبا 2024′′، بزيادة قدرها 4 في المائة مقارنة بالفترة نفسها من “مرحبا 2023”. وأكد عبد الجليل، في معرض تقديمه لعرض حول “الحصيلة المرحلية لعملية مرحبا 2024” بلجنة الداخلية والجماعات الترابية والبنيات الأساسية، أن الوزارة ستواصل بكل مكوناتها التعبئة الشاملة لكي تمر مرحلة وصول أفراد الجالية ومرورها بنقط العبور في الظروف الملائمة، عبر تعزيز التنسيق وتبادل المعلومات واستباق بعض الجوانب المرتبطة بتدبير أيام الذروة بين المتدخلين كافة. وعلى غرار السنوات الماضية، يضيف الوزير، يتوقع أن يشهد المغرب خلال هذه...

title: Will support BJP-led Haryana govt unconditionally till end of term Independent MLA Nayan Rawat
content: Chandigarh, Jul 18 (PTI) Putting to rest speculation that he might withdraw support to the BJP government in Haryana, Independent MLA Nayan Pal Rawat said Thursday he will back the Nayab Singh Saini dispensation unconditionally till the end of its term. The Prithla MLA, who was earlier reportedly unhappy with the functioning of some officers, told PTI, "The government has assured to take action in this regard and I am satisfied with its response." He said over the phone that he had brought to the government's notice that some officers "were working against its and the public's interest". Asserting that his support to the BJP government will continue, Rawat said, "I cannot leave the BJP."...

title: باقری با رئیس کمیته بین المللی صلیب سرخ دیدار کرد
creator: info@yjc.ir
content: علی باقری سرپرست وزارت امور خارجه که برای شرکت در دو نشست شورای امنیت در خصوص فلسطین و چندجانبه‌گرایی در نیویورک به سر می‌برد، در ادامه رایزنی‌های دیپلماتیک خود با خانم میریانا اسپولیاریک ایگر، رئیس کمیته بین المللی صلیب سرخ دیدار و گفتگو کرد. باقری در این دیدار ضمن تشکر از تلاش‌های کمیته بین‌المللی صلیب سرخ در خصوص فلسطین و غزه، شرایط انسانی مردم مظلوم فلسطین را بسیار نگران‌کننده توصیف کرد و گفت: متأسفانه رویکرد‌های سیاست‌زده، دوگانه و غلط تاکنون باعث شده است تلاش‌ها برای پایان بحران غزه بی‌نتیجه باقی بماند. وی در ادامه اذعان داشت: متاسفانه هر ساعت بیش از بیست نفر در غزه کشته و مجروح می‌شوند؛ آنچه اتفاق افتاده، یک فاجعه انسانی است. جامعه جهانی باید به سرعت رژیم صهیونیستی را متوقف و...

title: Fissures in Bengal BJP over Suvendu Adhikari's remark
content: Kolkata, Jul 18 (PTI) Fissures have allegedly emerged within the West Bengal BJP over Suvendu Adhikari's remarks dismissing 'Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas' in favour of 'Hum Unke Saath Jo Humare Saath,' with some leaders supporting his stance and others opposing it as contrary to the party line. Adhikari, addressing an extended session of the BJP's state executive committee on Wednesday, attributed the party's poor performance in West Bengal's Lok Sabha polls to insufficient support from the minority community. He asserted that 'Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas' was unnecessary and questioned the need for the Minority Morcha within the party. The West Bengal BJP unit distanced itself from Adhikari's...

title: BJP defends Muzaffarnagar Police order slams opposition
content: New Delhi, Jul 18 (PTI) The BJP on Thursday defended the Muzaffarnagar Police order to all eateries and carts selling eatables to display their names, saying it allows fasting Hindus who may want to eat at a pure veg restaurant, where the likelihood of them being served Satvik food is higher, a choice. BJP's IT department head Amit Malviya said on X, "India's 'secularism' can't be so fragile that a uniform order asking all eateries to display name and contact number of the owner/workers should disrupt it." He said almost two decades ago, all eateries in Mumbai's business district, prominently displayed name of the eatery, owner, contact number, last BMC inspection date and hygiene grade. If...

title: JO 2024: les premiers athlètes s'installent au village olympique
content: Au plus fort des JO, le village olympique à Saint-Denis et Saint-Ouen accueillera 15.000 personnes. En attendant, à une semaine de la cérémonie d'ouverture, les premiers athlètes ont pris leurs quartiers.

title: Pickup truck that killed 3 in Janakpuri traced driver held
content: New Delhi, Jul 18 (PTI) The driver of a pickup truck involved in an accident here that killed three people earlier this week has been apprehended, police said on Thursday. To trace the vehicle following the accident on the District Centre flyover in Janakpuri on July 14 morning, police analysed footage of CCTV cameras from Mangolpuri, Peeragarhi Chowk, Bhairo Enclave, District Centre Janakpuri, Tilak Nagar, Uttam Nagar Chowk, Dabri flyover and Dabri-Palam Road, they said. Ashish (25), Pawan (20) and Suraj (20) were injured after the truck hit their scooter, and were declared brought dead at a hospital, police said. The call about the accident was received by the Vikaspuri police station....

title: First Solar to build the Western Hemisphere’s largest solar R&D center
creator: Michelle Lewis
content: The US’s largest solar panel maker, First Solar (Nasdaq: FSLR), says it’s building the largest thin film R&D center in the Western Hemisphere. First Solar will site its new R&D center, the Jim Nolan Center for Solar Innovation, in Lake Township, Ohio. The 1.3 million-square-foot facility will include a pilot manufacturing line for producing full-sized prototypes of thin film and tandem PV modules. The company has not yet revealed when it expects to bring the facility online. “Thin films are the next technological battleground for the solar industry because they are key to commercializing tandem devices, which are anticipated to be the next disruption in photovoltaics,” said First Solar CEO...

title: Skeleton found during renovation of old building in south Kolkata
content: Kolkata, Jul 18 (PTI) A human skeleton was found during the renovation of an old building in south Kolkata's Kasba area on Thursday, police said. The identity or the sex of the skeleton is yet to be established, they said. "The skeleton was found by the construction workers inside a room at the old building in the Kamala Park area of Kasba. Nobody was living in that building. The skeleton was sent for examination to ascertain its identity," a police officer said. Police spoke to the owner of the building and also the locals in connection with it, he said.

title: Gujarat CM reviews measures taken to control viral encephalitis suspected cases at 33
content: Ahmedabad, Jul 18 (PTI) Gujarat Chief Minister Bhupendra Patel on Thursday reviewed the current status of suspected cases of viral encephalitis and the Chandipura virus and measures taken to control the spread of the diseases in the state. Encephalitis (inflammation of the brain) is one of the symptoms of the Chandipura virus. After the meeting, Patel said the government will launch a mega drive for vector control and containment of Chandipura virus and encephalitis cases. At present, a total of 33 suspected cases of viral encephalitis have been detected in the state. Of these, 30 are Gujarat residents and three from outside who are admitted in hospitals in the state, said an official...

title: Class 12 student jumps to death from 14th floor in Faridabad
content: Faridabad, Jul 18 (PTI) A Class 12 student died after he allegedly jumped off the 14th floor of a high-rise building in Sector 85 here on Thursday, police said. Family members of the victim, Divyanshu (17), suspected he took the extreme step as he was worried about not being prepared for a test he was supposed to take this morning, according to the police. However, the exact reason behind the alleged suicide is yet to be ascertained, they added. The incident took place in the Adore Happy Home Grand Society in the wee hours of Thursday, the police said. Divyanshu, who hails from Bihar, was living with his family on the 11th floor of the society and studied in Class 12 in a private school in...

title: I caught my child’s ‘sheepish’ nursery staff having a cheeky drink at lunch – I’m not happy but it’s divided people
creator: Olivia Stringer
content: A MUM has been left outraged after she spotted her child's nursery nurses having a drink of wine at lunchtime. However, people have been left divided on the issue, with some suggesting that the mum should report the staff, and others stating that they haven't done anything wrong. Taking to Mumsnet, the upset mum said that she had spotted the nursery staff when she went out for a pub lunch with her sister. She said: " In the pub I saw two nursery nurses from my child’s daycare having lunch and they each had a glass of wine. "There were also two empty glasses on the table but they could possibly have been from previous customers." She continued: "I wasn’t happy but my sister says it’s their...

title: 'Agni Missile fired by Nagpur' Cong's swipe at PM over Bhagwat's 'Bhagwan' remark
content: New Delhi, Jul 18 (PTI) The Congress on Thursday took a swipe at Prime Minister Narendra Modi over RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat's "bhagwan" remarks, calling the comments an "Agni Missile fired by Nagpur" and aimed at Lok Kalyan Marg. While the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) headquarters is situated in Nagpur, 7 Lok Kalyan Marg is the prime minister's official residence. The opposition party's swipe came after Bhagwat said in the course of self-development, a man may want to become a "superman", then "devta" and "bhagwan" and aspire for "vishwaroop" but nobody is certain what lies ahead. Congress general secretary in-charge communications Jairam Ramesh tagged a clip of Bhagwat's remarks and...

title: ‘A la Argentina no la amenaza nadie’: ¿Por qué Irán intimidó al Gobierno de Javier Milei?
creator: EFE
content: El respondió este jueves 18 de junio que a su no lo van a “amedrentar” y que le tiene “sin cuidado” las amenazas proferidas desde Irán acerca de que harán “lamentar” la enemistad del país suramericano, después de que este declarara a Hamás organización terrorista. Dos ministros del Gobierno argentino respondieron este jueves a las fuertes amenazas publicadas en un editorial del medio próximo a las que llamó a Milei “marioneta” por su acercamiento al “escenario anti-Irán del régimen sionista”. “Sin duda, Teherán no olvidará las políticas antiiraníes de . Pero Irán ha demostrado que no juega fácilmente en el tablero de ajedrez del enemigo, pero en el momento adecuado y en la...

title: Development of farmers should be prioritised to develop India Union minister
content: Aizawl, Jul 18 (PTI) Development of farmers should be prioritised to develop the country, Union MoS for Agriculture Bhagirath Choudhary said on Thursday. During an interaction with farmers, he said the Centre is making efforts to increase the farmers' income by four times by 2029. Choudhary, who arrived here on Wednesday on a three-day tour, visited the College of Veterinary Sciences and Animal Husbandry at Selesih near Aizawl and interacted with farmers and officials of the state Agriculture Department. He said the Centre was supporting Farmer Producer Organisations (FPOs) to enhance agricultural productivity and sustainability. Choudhary told the officials that the state government has to...

title: Tyler Shandro cleared of professional misconduct by Law Society of Alberta tribunal
creator: Matthew Black
content: Article content A Law Society of Alberta tribunal has cleared former Alberta cabinet minister Tyler Shandro of professional misconduct. Shandro had faced three citations alleging he broke professional code of conduct rules, the first of which centred on a heated confrontation in a Calgary doctor’s driveway in 2020 . The second citation was related to Shandro’s use of his government email to respond to accusations from the public that his wife’s health benefits company represented a conflict of interest. The third accused him of using his position as minister of health to obtain personal cell phone numbers and contacting members of the public outside of regular working hours In a ruling...

title: Кобахидзе: отношение ЕС к Грузии изменится после стабилизации ситуации в регионе
content: ТБИЛИСИ, 18 июля. /ТАСС/. Отношение Евросоюза к Грузии изменится в лучшую сторону, как только успокоится ситуация в регионе. Об этом заявил премьер-министр Грузии Ираклий Кобахидзе по итогам прошедшего в Великобритании саммита Европейского политического сообщества. Кобахидзе отметил, что обсудил с участниками саммита, в частности с главой европейской дипломатии Жозепом Боррелем и главой Европейского совета Шарлем Мишелем, отношения Грузии и ЕС, вопросы расширения сообщества и текущую повестку дня. "Мое общее впечатление таково, что как только в регионе глобально изменится и успокоится ситуация, отношение к Грузии существенно изменится. Этот процесс начнется и до того, однако многое...

title: Valor Geral de Vendas (VGV): o que é e qual é a importância dele no mercado imobiliário?
content: No universo das construtoras e dos investidores do mercado imobiliário, poucas siglas são tão relevantes quanto VGV. O Valor Geral de Vendas é uma métrica de avaliação do faturamento de um empreendimento imobiliário e ajuda a contabilizar a receita de um lançamento a partir da perspectiva de venda das unidades . “O cálculo para o VGV consiste em multiplicar o preço de venda de cada unidade do edifício pelo número total de unidades”, resume Roberto Dib, CFO da Vila 11, empresa especializada em empreendimentos multifamily. Na prática, imagine que uma construtora está desenvolvendo um prédio residencial com 20 apartamentos e cada unidade será negociada por R$ 100 mil. Para...

title: Alemanha está preparada para um Trump 2.0?
creator: Deutsche Welle
content: Muitos políticos alemães torcem por uma vitória democrata nos EUA, ainda que improvável, lembrando-se com horror do mandato de Donald Trump. Especialistas antecipam: vai ser preciso se virar com o que vier.Poucos minutos após a tentativa frustrada de atentado em Butler, Pensilvânia, corria mundo a foto do pré-candidato presidencial Donald Trump, de rosto sujo de sangue e punho em riste, diante da bandeira dos Estados Unidos. Desde então, muitos comparam essa imagem com os blecautes mentais do presidente Joe Biden. Dois dias mais tarde, a convenção nacional do Partido Republicano formalizava em Milwaukee a candidatura de Trump, sob aplauso ensurdecedor. A impressão é que agora...

title: SDLP MLA brands repeated ‘Up The Ra’ graffiti a ‘disgrace’
content: Colin McGrath has condemned the graffiti in Dundrum Colin McGrath has criticised another bout of vandalism in South Down as “disgraceful”. It comes after ‘Up the Ra’ was scrawled on a fence. The SDLP MLA said it is “disgraceful to see this graffiti in Dundrum for the second time in as many weeks”. "There is no place in our society for this, and those responsible should be the ones cleaning it off,” he added. "Unfortunately, as with history, someone else will probably clean up their mess.” Police have been contacted for further details. There have been increased reports of graffiti across Northern Ireland in recent weeks, including a spate properties in Antrim being daubed with racist...

title: Tsunoda "pronto" para desafiar Verstappen na Red Bull
creator: online@record.pt (Record)
content: Com as exibições abaixo do esperado de Sergio Pérez nos últimos meses, o seu lugar na Red Bull enquanto colega de equipa do campeão do mundo Max Verstappen tem estado em risco mesmo depois de ter renovado recentemente até 2026. A equipa cuja base é em Milton Keynes poderá rescindir vários contratos este verão e a Red Bull está a avaliar as suas opções. Yuki Tsunoda, piloto na equipa satélite da Red Bull, considera-se merecedor de dar o salto caso surja a oportunidade. "Sim, claro. Caso contrário, não teriam anunciado o meu lugar [na RB para 2025] tão cedo este ano. Sinto-me preparado em comparação com os últimos três anos e para lutar contra as equipas de topo,...

title: Donald Trump: Investigadores consideran que la cuenta en Steam a nombre del atacante es falsa
creator: Redacción PERÚ21
content: La investigaciones en torno al atentado que sufrió el expresidente y candidato republicano Donald Trump continúan. Ahora las autoridades encargadas de la indagación creen que la cuenta de Steam (plataforma de juegos) del tirador es falsa. Según había señalado CNN, una fuente había indicado que Thomas Matthews Crooks había publicado en Steam el siguiente mensaje:“El 13 de julio será mi estreno, observen cómo se desarrolla”. La fuente no dio más detalles sobre el momento ni si hubo otras publicaciones. Hasta ayer todo apuntaba a que la cuenta sí pertenecía a Crooks. Sin embargo, CNN aclaró más tarde que investigadores del FBI están evaluando esta información. Aseguraron que...

title: Avokati Hoxha: Faton Hajrizit i bie më mirë të kthehet në Kosovë, në Serbi s’do kenë mëshirë për të
content: Avokati Asdren Hoxha ka komentuar ngjarjen që ka bërë bujë në të gjithë Ballkanin: vrasja dhe plagosja e një polici serb në Serbi, për të cilën i dyshuar është Faton Hajrizi, një i arratisur nga drejtësia kosovare. Sipas Hoxhës, Faton Hajrizit do t’i ishte më mirë të kthehej në Kosovë dhe të vuante dënimin atje sesa të arrestohet dhe të procedohet në Serbi. “Faton Hajrizit më së miri i bie me ardhë në Kosovë. Nuk ka askund më mirë se në vendin e vet, në shtëpinë e vet, në mes të njerëzve të vet. Në qoftë se arrestohet edhe procedohet në Republikën e Serbisë, ai rrezikon dënim me burgim të përjetshëm, dhe aty Serbia nuk do të ketë asnjë...

title: Chinese lab uses AI to provide better weather forecasts
content: ANKARA Chinese scientists have developed a new model for sub-seasonal forecasts using artificial intelligence (AI) technology, that provides better weather forecasts to reduce the cost of climate disasters, state media reported on Thursday. The model, "FuXi-Subseasonal," developed by scientists from the Shanghai Academy of Artificial Intelligence for Science (SAIS), Fudan University, and China's National Climate Center, has a thousand-fold increase in operational speed, and higher forecasting accuracy and longer forecasting period than existing international authoritative models, local English daily Global Times reported citing team members who have developed the model. "Climate disaster...

title: Dwie wysoko oceniane gry za darmo w Epic Games w tym jeden uznany horror!
content: Pierwsza gra, czyli to przygodowy tytuł mocno inspirowany realiami lat 90. Wcielamy się w postać o imieniu Ashley, która otrzymała klucze do rodzinnej pralni. Sprawy wymykają się spod kontroli, gdy nasza protagonistka postanawia przekształcić ten przybytek w... salon automatów do grania! Do naszej dyspozycji oddano 35 gier, które pochodzą z różnych czasów rozrywki komputerowej. Zatapiać możemy się w grach 32-bitowych, wektorowych i nieco nowszych tytułach. Ogrywać będziemy więc bijatyki, szalone gry akcji, arkadówki, czy ściganki. Co ciekawe, w retro produkcje możemy bawić się w kooperacji - maksymalnie do 4 graczy lokalnie. Arcade Paradise ma za zadanie przywołać u...

title: Pacific Drive sales drive past 600K copies sold
creator: Justin Carter
content: Sales for Ironwood Studios' Pacific Drive have exceeded 600,000 copies. The developer revealed the news alongside its release of the game's first post-launch content . Ironwood's debut title first launched back in late February for PlayStaton 5 and PC to strong reviews. CEO and creative director Alex Dracott said the studio was "blown away" by Pacific Drive's new milestone, and thanked players for the response. "It is a testament to the hard work of everyone at Ironwood Studios," he wrote. "None of this would be possible without [player] support, and we’re thankful for the chance to continue supporting Pacific Drive and improving their experience." Ahead of the game's release, Game...

title: Boricua que preside el Concejo Municipal de Milwaukee no entiende cómo Donald Trump recobró viabilidad política
creator: José A. Delgado
content: En entrevista con El Nuevo Día, José Perez habla de la convención presidencial en su ciudad, critica la intención de impulsar deportaciones masivas y de sus raíces puertorriqueñas 18 de julio de 2024 - 12:46 PM Milwaukee, Wisconsin - Como principal funcionario electo latino en Milwaukee , al puertorriqueño José Pérez , presidente del Concejo Municipal, le causa mucha preocupación la posibilidad de que Donald Trump regrese a la Casa Blanca .

title: Bags of rice recalled in seven states as they may contain 'rodent parts'
creator: Franca Akenami
content: Wehah Farms recalled 4,600 cases of its in seven states. The was initiated due to the potential presence of "foreign object that appears to be of rodent origin." The classified this as a Class II risk recall, which means the product may cause temporary or reversible adverse health consequences. The affected products are sold in 1lb bags with the lot code 231004 and a best-before date of October 4, 2024. The affects products sold in Arizona, California, Florida, Maine, New Hampshire, Oregon, and Wisconsin, per Newsweek. It remains unclear how the became contaminated with rodent parts. FDA are classified into three levels, with Class II being the second most serious type. The FDA sets limits...

title: Emergenza: a Gaza non c’è più cibo né acqua, si beve quella del mare, mentre Amnesty ricorda il calvario dei 116 ostaggi che sono ancora nelle mani di Hamas
creator: repubblicawww@repubblica.it (Redazione Repubblica.it)
content: ROMA – La Fondazione CESVI , è presente in queste ore sul campo, che raccoglie le testimonianze della popolazione della Striscia di Gaza dove 4 famiglie su 5 non hanno accesso a fonti idriche, 2 milioni di persone soffrono di insicurezza alimentare e quasi un milione di malattie legate alle scarse condizioni igieniche. Fondazione CESVI sta distribuendo 50 mila litri di acqua, per raggiungere fino a 1.200 famiglie, 7 tonnellate di Plumpy’Nut per bambini al di sotto dei 5 anni e pacchi alimentari a 12.600 sfollati (2.100 famiglie). Ridotti a bere l’acqua del mare. «Stiamo morendo di fame – racconta un abitante della Striscia - non abbiamo a disposizione nemmeno un boccone di cibo o un sorso...

title: Развитие строительства в Воронежской области оценил вице-премьер Марат Хуснуллин
content: Воронежский губернатор Александр Гусев рассказал о достижениях региона. Было отмечено, что область уверенно выполняет многие отчетные показатели. Но есть и параметры, которые можно улучшить. В качестве примера глава региона привел национальный проект "Безопасные качественные дороги". На его реализацию в Воронежской области запланировано 6,1 миллиарда рублей, в том числе более двух миллиардов - из федерального бюджета. Все контракты уже заключены, кассовое освоение по ним составляет около 80 процентов. Александр Гусев выделил конкретные направления, которые необходимо доработать. На совещании подняли вопрос о внедрении Национальной системы пространственных данных. Она находится в стадии...

title: Marie Wheat Hammett
content: Published 11:46 am Thursday, July 18, 2024 By Natchez Obituaries VIDALIA – Services for Marie Wheat Hammett will be at 12:30 p.m., on Friday, July 19, 2024, at Sycamore Baptist Church, Vidalia, LA with Bro. Marie Wheat Hammett, 86, of Vidalia, LA, passed away on Wednesday, July 17, 2024, at Camelot Leisure Living. title: Nintendo releases Joy-Con charging station ahead of Switch 2 launch
creator: Jak Connor
content: Nintendo just made the Joy-Con charging situation with the Switch much more manageable, especially for those who have many Joy-Con controllers around their Switch setup. Nintendo has taken to its social media account to announce it will be releasing a first-party Joy-Con charging station that will enable buyers to charge two Joy-Cons. This makes the living room charging situation much easier as now gamers will be able to have two Joy-Cons charging on a charging station and another two charging on the Switch itself. Additionally, the new charging station integrates with the retro wireless NES gamepads, which are typically used to play Nintendo Switch Online games. The charging station can...

title: शराब के साथ बीएमपी जवान गिरफ्तार:कहा - हमने लिफ्ट मांगा था, दबोचा गया; 15 व्हिस्की की बोतल बरामद
content: भागलपुर के मोजाहिदपुर थाना पुलिस ने गुप्त सूचना के आधार पर बड़ी कार्रवाई की है। पुलिस ने एक गाड़ी से तस्करी की जा रही शराब को जब्त कर मामले का खुलासा किया है। पुलिस ने जगदीशपुर थाना क्षेत्र के बाइपास के पास से 2 शराब तस्कर मनोज पासवान और उसके साथी पु गिरफ्तारी के बाद मनोज पासवान ने पुलिस को बताया कि स्टेशन पर उतरने के बाद उसने देखा कि उसके गांव का ही व्यक्ति कार से अपने घर जा रहा था। इस दौरान लिफ्ट मांगने पर वह पुलिस पासवान की कार में सवार हो गया। हालांकि, सूत्रों से मिली जानकारी के अनुसार उक्त शराब की एक बड़ी खेप लेकर किसी ट्रेन से बीएमपी जवान मनोज पासवान ही भागलपुर पहुंचा था। अपने साथी को स्टेशन बुलाकर गाड़ी में सारा शराब भरकर उसे लेकर अपने गांव ले जा रहा था। दोनों शराब तस्कर की गिरफ्तारी...

title: Шефове в БФС с мисия за реактивиране на футбола в Родопите
content: Техническият Директор на БФС Кирил Котев и Директорът Развитие Детско-юношески Футбол в БФС Лъчезар Димов посетиха родопския край с идеята да се инфомрират за състоянието на инфраструктурата в района касаеща развитието на българския футбол. Визитата им включи посещение на градовете Смолян, Доспат, Чепеларе и Златоград, където представителите на Българския футболен съюз проведоха срещи с кметове и общински наместници в района. Обсъдени бяха възможностите за разработване на стратегия за възобновяване на спортната и футболна дейност в региона, възстановяване на инфраструктурата и популяризиране на футбола. title: DNA evidence solves a 61-year-old cold case in Winnebago County, sheriff's office says
creator: ANNA HANSEN ahansen@madison.com
content: Winnebago County authorities have named the probable killer in a 61-year-old cold case. Unfortunately, he died two years ago. The Winnebago County Sheriff’s Office laid out the case in a Facebook post . William A. Doxtator had long been a suspect in the gruesome 1963 murder of a 24-year-old gas station operator who was stabbed 53 times, according to a Facebook post by the Sheriff’s Office. Years of tips and DNA testing had implicated Doxtator, but it wasn’t until 2023 that Cybergenetics, a Pittsburgh-based DNA software company, determined that Doxtator’s DNA had been on a blanket used to cover the victim. Detectives initially got Doxtator’s DNA through a 2018 warrant, which proved it a...

title: Терориста Гіркіна етапували в колонію для російських силовиків
content: Ігоря Стрєлков (Гіркін) (Фото:Московські суди загальної юрисдикції / Telegram) Російського терориста Ігоря Стрєлкова ( Гіркіна) , якого Росія засудила до чотирьох років колонії за обвинуваченням в «екстремізмі», етапували в колонію для колишніх співробітників силових структур РФ. Про це повідомляє російський пропагандистський ресурс ТАСС. За словами дружини терориста Мирослави Регінської, він перебуває у виправній колонії No 5 міста Кірово-Чепецька Кіровської області. РосЗМІ стверджують, що ця колонія відома тим, що там покарання відбувають колишні працівники силових структур і правоохоронних органів. content: Predsjednik Crne Gore Jakov Milatović je kazao da je na Samitu Evropske političke zajednice (EPC) u Londonu dobio snažnu podršku brojnih evropskih lidera da je budućnost Crne Gore u Evropskoj uniji. title: Condenan a tres años de cárcel a religioso ortodoxo por comerciar con pornografía
creator: Gino Farfán
content: Un tribunal ruso condenó hoy a tres años de cárcel al arcipreste Dmitri Kuvirtálov, religioso enviado a Ucrania para asistir a las tropas, por comerciar con materiales pronográficos. “La sentencia del Tribunal del distrito Zyúzinski de Moscú condenó a Dmitri a tres años de cárcel en una prisión común en lugar de los ocho reclamados por la Fiscalía ”, comentó a TASS su abogado, Denís Balúyev. Según el jurista, el párroco de la iglesia del Arcángel Miguel de Létovo, en la región de Moscú, fue condenado por el envío de mensajes pornográficos en sus comunicaciones personales en el sistema de mensajería WhatsApp. Esta condena crea un precedente, precisó, ya que califica...

title: В новом сезоне российские команды смогут производить до семи замен
content: Российские команды при определенных условиях будут иметь возможность производить до семи замен в сезоне-2024/25, сообщается на официальном сайте РФС. С нового сезона в правила внесено уточнение, следовательно которому в случае, если команда А использовала максимальное количество замен (5) в матче и игрок получит черепно-мозговую травму, коллектив сможет произвести дополнительную замену футболиста. После проведения дополнительной замены по вышеуказанной причине, команда Б получит возможность также сделать дополнительную замену по любой причине. Такая опция предусмотрена в соответствии со спортивным принципом. Поправки в регламенте имеют обратный эффект. В случае, если футболист команды...

title: Allowing Muslims to live in India biggest mistake: Union minister Giriraj Singh
content: In a controversial statement, Union minister for textiles Giriraj Singh has said that allowing Muslims to live in India after the partition was the country’s biggest mistake. The MP from Begusarai constituency said, “The biggest mistake was to let Muslims live here. If the country was partitioned on religious lines, why were Muslims allowed to remain here? Had they not been allowed to live here this situation would not have been created.” He was quoted in an article by an RSS mouthpiece Panchjanya , where he allegedly said that had all the Muslims migrated to Pakistan, India would be a different country. “It is the misfortune for this country. title: Navi Mumbai: Nigerian National Arrested With Mephedrone Worth Rs 86.40 Lakh Following Seizure From 2 Men
content: Following the arrest of two men with Mephedrone (MD) worth Rs 2 crore, Anti Narcotics Cell (ANC) of Navi Mumbai have now arrested a Nigerian National female in possession of MD worth Rs 86. 40 lakh. The accused lady has been identified Blessing King alias Khristina Enoch Yakubu (40). She was arrested from Naigaon in Nallasopara. On Monday midnight, ANC had nabbed Fazal Jafar Khan (21) and Salauddin Allauddin Shaikh (21), both residents of Mahim on their two wheelers at Vashi gaon on Sion-Panvel highway after they had received an information about the duo coming to provide 1004 grams of MD worth Rs 2 crore to someone. title: نقش آفرینی در تصمیمات و اعتماد به بخش خصوصی مطالبه اساسی فعالان اقتصادی از رئیس جمهور است
content: حسین پیرموذن ۲۸ تیر در یکصدو بیست و هفتمین جلسه شورای گفت‌وگوی دولت و بخش خصوصی که در اتاق بازرگانی اردبیل برگزار شد، اظهار کرد: انتخابات به نوعی مبادله مطلوبیت میان جامعه و سیاستمداران است و بخش خصوصی، صنعت و تولید در مسیری که در انتخابات رقم خورد خواهان کاهش فشارهای اقتصادی هستند و اصلاح قوانین، تسهیل امور، بهبود فضای کسب و کار بوده و اعتماد به بخش خصوصی و نقش آفرینی در تصمیم‌گیری‌ها جزو مطالبات مهم بخش خصوصی از رئیس جمهور منتخب است. وی با تاکید بر بازنگری و تجدید نظر در برخی از قوانین تامین اجتماعی گفت: ساماندهی مشاغل سخت و زیان‌آور و قوانین سختی کار و مشمولان این قانون نیازمند بررسی و بازنگری است و بسیاری از واحدهای تولیدی و صنایع استان گریبانگیر موانع متعددی در رابطه با قوانین تامین...

title: Перешедший в "Динамо" хоккеист Комтуа назвал прекрасными условия жизни в России
content: МОСКВА, 18 июля. /ТАСС/. Канадский нападающий московского хоккейного клуба "Динамо" Максим Комтуа был готов к переезду в Россию, поскольку считает отличными условия для жизни в стране. Об этом он рассказал журналистам. Комтуа подписал контракт с "Динамо" в четверг, соглашение рассчитано на один сезон. "Не боялся ли критики из-за переезда в Россию? Мне все равно, что люди говорят обо мне, не волнует эта ситуация. Провел исследование: условия жизни прекрасные, клуб классный, готовы были с женой переехать, я молод, готов играть здесь. О России сложились наилучшие впечатления", - сказал Комтуа. Комтуа 25 лет, в прошедшем сезоне он провел 2 матча в Национальной хоккейной лиге (НХЛ) за...

title: Marco撇低P1X3L隊友 帶資優細佬闖荷蘭 3個理由決定跟哥哥參與拍攝
creator: 星島頭條網
content: P1X3L成員Marco(葉振弘)早前撇低隊友,與智商達141的資優細佬葉振延(Manson)去荷蘭拍攝Viu節目《巴絲Let's go歐》,細佬笑指可免費旅行很開心,但Marco則直言為行程感擔心。文、圖:霍淇 2人今次選擇遊荷蘭,主要是因為當地有親戚可順道探親,這是兩兄弟首次一起外遊,也是細佬首次拍攝節目,作為哥哥的Marco想法亦有轉變,「平時和其他成員拍節目,我只是考慮自己的表現,今次我會擔心他的表現,而這次我也盡量和他一起感受和享受,不想為好笑而製造一些節目效果。」Manson則謂兩兄弟的感情一直也很好,對上一次吵架都已是一年多前為了冷氣機溫度而爭吵,所以就算首次參與拍攝也沒甚麼好擔心,因為有問題也可以丟給哥哥處理。 父母沒偏心 問到為何今次會拍節目,他笑指有3個理由,分別是「不用錢」、「有錢收」及「不用計劃行程」,至於是否有興趣入行,他即笑指唱歌拍節目幾開心,但見到哥哥平常返、放工的時間,自己未必頂得順,現時還是先完成Master(碩士課程)和Doctor(博士課程)後再打算。細佬雖是資優生,但Marco指父母從沒有偏心,會用不同的方式教導,「父母覺得不一定每個人都要讀好書,如果讀書不好,就做其他擅長的事。如果他真的特別有天份,就給他一條更好的路去走。」 服裝:AAPE BY *A BATHING APE®️

title: WNBA adds DraftKings as second official betting partner, continuing year of growth for league
content: The WNBA landed another frontline sponsorship deal this week, adding DraftKings as its official sports betting partner. The deal will give DraftKings the rights to the intellectual property of the league and its teams, as well as access to official WNBA data that can then be used for betting and daily fantasy. DraftKings will also be the presenting sponsor for the league’s new content platform that will run in September centered around the WNBA’s playoff race. Advertisement The WNBA also has a deal with FanDuel to serve as its official betting partner. The NBA also has the same official partners. “The WNBA has seen tremendous growth, which continues to be a bright spot in the sports world....

title: В Ярославской области количество школьных "кванториумов" вырастет до восьми
content: ЯРОСЛАВЛЬ, 18 июля. /ТАСС/. Новые школьные "Кванториумы" появятся в двух образовательных учреждениях Ярославля и Рыбинска. Таким образом, количество детских технопарков в регионе вырастет до восьми, сообщил в Telegram-канале губернатор региона Михаил Евраев. "По нацпроекту "Образование" в регионе появятся два новых школьных "Кванториума". Детские технопарки откроются в школе No 33 Ярославля и школе No 12 Рыбинска. Всего в Ярославской области уже работают шесть "Кванториумов", из них два мобильных, которые выезжают во все районы", - написал он. Технопарки будут оснащены цифровыми лабораториями, интерактивными комплексами. Дети смогут заниматься на 3D-принтерах, создавать прототипы на...

নদী পেরোতে আর অসুবিধায় পড়তে হবে না পাথরপ্রতিমা বাসিন্দাদের
content: নদী পেরোতে আর অসুবিধা হবেনা পাথরপ্রতিমার দ্বীপাঞ্চলের মানুষজনের। ইতিমধ্যে পাঁচটি ভাসমান পল্টন জেটি তৈরি হয়ে এসেছে সেখানে। আর‌ও ১০ থেকে ১৫ টি পল্টন জেটি তৈরির পরিকল্পনা করা হচ্ছে। ফলে পাথরপ্রতিমার বাসিন্দাদের আর নদীর বুকে যাতায়াতের ঝক্কি পোহাতে হবে না। ব্লকের ১৫ টি গ্রাম পঞ্চায়েতকে এক সুতোয় বাঁধতে অভিনব এই পরিকল্পনা করা হয়েছে। পাথরপ্রতিমার সর্বশেষ গ্রাম পঞ্চায়েত জি প্লট। যেখানে গোবর্ধনপুর পর্যটনকেন্দ্র গড়ে তোলার চিন্তাভাবনা রয়েছে সরকারের। তার জন্য যাবতীয় পরিকল্পনা সেরে ফেলা হয়েছে। জেটিগুলি অতিসত্বর সকলের জন্য খুলে দেওয়া হবে বলে জানিয়েছেন পাথরপ্রতিমা পঞ্চায়েত সমিতির সহ-সভাপতি রাজ বাহাদুর সিং। এছাড়াও একটি বড় সেতু তৈরির পরিকল্পনা রয়েছে বলে জানান তিনি। এই নিয়ে স্থানীয়...

title: Rory McIlroy 10 back, recalibrates Open focus: 'try to make the cut'
creator: Field Level Media
content: Rory McIlroy turned in his worst major tournament round since 2019 and entered the clubhouse trailing leader Justin Thomas by 10 shots after 18 holes at the 152nd Open Championship at Royal Troon Golf Club in Troon, South Ayrshire, Scotland. Releasing his club and a tee shot that buried in the center of a fairway wall bunker, McIlroy let out an audible reaction and perhaps a call for divine intervention. "Ah, God," McIlroy said, eventually wrapping up a plus-7 round (78) and a T139 standing on the leaderboard as the afternoon wave hit the course. "Yeah, difficult day," McIlroy said. "I felt like I did OK for the first part of the round and then missed the green at the Postage Stamp there...

title: Federal agencies call out companies making Delta-8 products that resemble kids' treats
creator: Felicia Jordan
content: The Ohio Department of Commerce's recently-created Division of Cannabis Control has issued a consumer alert after federal agencies sent cease and desist letters to several companies that make Delta-8 edibles packaged in ways that resemble popular children's snack foods. According to a press release from the FTC, the cease and desist letters were sent to five different companies that manufacture the edibles; none are based in the Tri-State, but similar products are sold in the region. Last summer, an 8-year-old boy in Northern Kentucky was hospitalized after eating a Delta-8 gummy believing it was candy. The child was able to purchase a product called "Nerdy Bears" that came in packaging...

title: 中 외교부, 중일 외무장관 회담 거론되자 신중..."정해진 바 없다"
creator: 이명동 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 이명동 기자 = 중국 외교부가 자국과 일본의 양자 외무장관 회담 성사 가능성에 신중한 태도를 보였다. 린젠 중국 외교부 대변인은 18일 정례브리핑에서 왕이 중국공산당 중앙정치국 위원 겸 외교부장의 아세안(ASEAN·동남아시아국가연합)+ 회의 참석 여부와 가미카와 요코 일본 외무상이 양자회담을 계획과 관련해 "현재로서 공유할 정보가 없다"고 설명했다. 이날 일부 언론은 양국이 아세안 외무장관회의를 계기로 양국 외무장관 회담을 계획하고 있다고 보도했다. 아세안은 오는 21~27일 라오스 수도 비엔티안에서 외무장관회의를 연다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

OFICIAL: Lyon contrata Mikautadze, goleador da Geórgia no Euro 2024
content: O Lyon assegurou a contratação de Georges Mikautadze. O avançado destacou-se ao serviço da Geórgia no Euro 2024, com três golos em quatro jogos, um deles diante de Portugal. O atacante de 23 anos estava no Metz por empréstimo do Ajax e o clube francês acionou a opção de compra de 13 milhões logo após o Campeonato da Europa . Agora, o Lyon pagou 18,5 milhões de euros, mais variáveis, que poderão chegar aos 4,5 milhões. O Metz assegurou ainda 15 por cento de uma futura venda. AO MINUTO: tudo o que se passa no mercado de transferências Mikautadze nasceu em França e esteve precisamente na formação do Lyon até aos 15 anos. Estreou-se como sénior no Metz e passou ainda pela...

title: Las íntimas confesiones de Mauricio Pinilla: “Llevo ocho meses sin consumir alcohol”
content: Mauricio Pinilla está saliendo de un momento difícil en su vida privada. Una depresión lo ha marcado en el último tiempo y poco a poco comienza a salir a flote. El exdelantero contó inéditos detalles de este proceso en el programa Con Contenido. Uno de los episodios recientes que lo golpeó fue su salida de TVN, donde se había consolidado como rostro durante tres años. “ Fue un baño de agua fría. Tenía muchas ganas de seguir y lamentablemente no se dieron las condiciones, pero como que mi cabeza y mi cuerpo me dijeron ‘tienes que parar un poco’. Y me llegó justo en ese momento, en el momento que estoy ahora, que estoy reconstruyendo lazos familiares, con mis hijos y estoy muy...

title: Sergi Fita debuta en Gandia
creator: Jesús Sansaloni
content: El tenista de Aielo del Malferit Sergi Fita debutó este pasado miércoles en la fase final del primer torneo del circuito ATP Orysol, que se está celebrando en la playa de Gandía. Sufrió un duro revés en forma de derrota ante el italiano Lorenzo Giustino, que partía como cuarto cabeza de serie. Fita, que entraba en el cuadro final gracias a una tarjeta de invitación, fue superado por el jugador transalpino por el marcador de 6-3 y 6-1 tras una hora y media de partido. A pesar de lo abultado del marcador, cabe destacar que el encuentro fue muy igualado y el de la Vall d'Albaida perdió innumerables ocasiones de romper el servicio a su rival, que se valió por la gran veteranía de sus...
